review:
Doctor Madhumati has good experience and hold on subject.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Madhumanti explains the issue in detail and I was very satisfied with the work. I got dental fillings done, and she got lots of X-Rays done to show me the cause of the issue clearly, and explain the process. Initially we thought there'd be 6 teeth affected and would require fillings, but during the filling process, the adjacent teeth were cleaned and it was found out that the decay is superficial and filling will not be required there. Doctor Madhumanti pointed it out and saved me the money. Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
When I was just starting off on the chair, I heard a mum come in the clinic and proudly, gratefully and laughingly say to Dr. Madhumanti, "My daughter said to me to wait downstairs only". 

Dr. Madhumanti is extremely dexterous, was very verbal with communicating to me what she was going to do just before she was going to do it so that I would know what to anticipate. She continuously took feedback from my reactions and actively kept me engaged to understand how I was feeling throughout the process.

I've been going to a family dentist for years back at hometown, but I think I'm going to switch now.

Extremely recommend her to everybody.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I took my 4 year old kid who had severe toothache to Dr. Madhumanti for treatment. My kid is extremely reserved and doesn't open up to strangers so I feared that he would not let Dr. Madhumanti to examine him at all. I was really impressed by the way she handled my kid and established trust with him in a very short time. Although my kid still did not open up completely, but she managed to get enough for an initial diagnosis and also prescribed necessary medicines. I am thankful to Dr. Madhumanti for being patient with my kid and handing his tantrums with such ease. 
She also did not charge any exorbitant fee and she explained everything in detail and in advance. That was helpful to plan things at our end as well.

review: I recently had a fantastic experience at The Tooth story. The staff was incredibly professional , attentive & friendly, making me feel comfortable throughout my visit. They don't push unnecessary treatments, ensuring you get exactly what you need without wasting your money. I wholeheartedly recommend THE TOOTH STORY  to anyone seeking top skin care services…

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The doctor lacked any empathy towards the patient. Instead of going for a regular filling, the doctor went ahead with her own set of procedures without seeking so much of a consent from the patient. ****** ************* **** *** ******* ** **** ** ******** **** *** *** ******* *** **** *********** The pre-cleaning to filling was done so meticulously and harshly **** ** *** ******* *** ***** ** ***** * ****** ** ********* ** **** ****** ** ******* ******* ******** ** ** *** ********** *********** *** ** ****** *** **** *********
reply_text: The tooth in concern was giving u pain before u came here and on taking xrays , the decay was already near to the nerves, We had suggested to go for Root Canal Treatment initially, but you did not listen to me at all and insisted on giving a regular filling… the consequences were obvious and u were informed that if pain increases, to come back and go for RCT. While cleaning the decay, I had suggested to take local anaesthesia, but again u didnt allow me to do so… it is very difficult for us as doctors to treat such patients who donot listen to advise at all, come with preconceived ideas and if they suffer d consequences, then also blame the doctors … its a strange world .

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Got my Smile Designing done here from Dr Madhumanti, it was an amazing experience and no pain at all. I couldn’t be happier … Thank you The Tooth Story.
Definitely recommended .
Doctor explained issue well but seems to be in hurry for doing root canal. That made me curious , so I won’t recommend.
reply_text:
The patient was Pregnant and was suffering from a lot of pain , we have examined the tooth and given two options of treatment - either extraction or RCT . 
If we go for extraction, she will lose the tooth which can be otherwise saved and moreover she has to take painkillers and antibiotics for 4-5 days and being in 1st Trimester, the Gynaecologist will definitely not recommend this.
Hence, RCT is a justified treatment option where I can relieve her pain without giving medicines as well save her chewing molar tooth. 
We even didn’t start any treatment as we asked to get a co - consent from her Gynaecologist as we will use local anaesthesia. 
 So, we just did a consultation and gave our suggestions.  If you cannot even take our suggestions, then donot come to doctors, do your treatment yourself.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
1. She was using an old needle to eject some chemical in mouth when I asked why using old she rather replacing it said “use your brain”
2. On our first appointment we had to wait for like 45mins before she arrived
3. Charged more **** **** *** ********* ******* **** * ******* ******* *** ***** *** **** ******* ***** Also all the tools they used were neat and clean and all needles were opened in front of me
reply_text:
1. The various medicines and chemical agents that we use while doing Root Canal Procedures comes in syringe like packages.During treatment, we use disposable tips for each patient where as the body of the syringe remains the same. If you have any doubts, you can ask the doctors right at the clinic, they will explain you.Please donot imagine things on your own and pen down false statements. 

2." Use your Brain"  - I had scolded you since you started touching and messing up all the instruments and medicines with your bare hands. Please understand, this kind of activity can contaminate all the instruments that have been kept sterilized. This is for your own safety. When you are a highly educated professional in your respective field, we ,as doctors, also expect cooperation from your end during treatment.
I can understand,  since I had scolded you for ur insincere behaviour, you had given a negative review here with false statements. I hope , u will realize later once your anger comes down.
I wish you all the best .
